column4: Need help with the video... i have an msi 880G-E45 board with integrated video card... i have my monitor connected with the dvi plug and my tv with the hdmi... but the monitor is not being recognize... can anyone help me out ?

Need help with the video... i have an msi 880G-E45 board with integrated video card... i have my monitor connected with the dvi plug and my tv with the hdmi... but the TV (HDMI) is not being recognize... can anyone help me out ?
